name: Picnic Panic Potato
description:
A boy seeks out to exact vengeance on his mother for the cruel, cruel torture that is...

Being forced to enjoy a picnic!

You play as a boy with a potato gun – be naughty, go knock some birds unconscious and see if you can do it before Mom comes back.

Controls: Mouse + Keyboard

WASD to move, Mouse to look around, left-click to shoot. Spacebar to jump. Double tap to double jump.

This game was made by Gustav and Nanna for Create Jam 2022 Spring – Cottagecore Edition. The following (free) asset packs and sound databases were used:

Assets from Unreal Marketplace

* Animal Variety Pack

* Dynamic Grass System Lite

* Interactive Open World Foliage

* Megascans – Vegetables

* temperate Vegetation: Spruce Forest

Sounds from https://freesound.org/

Royalty Free images from Pexels.com, Unsplash.com & Canva

(P.S. the intro cutscene is bugged on some PCs, if you want you can watch it here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1whshVZkSgoyF7HAKX6Ndp-kTc7VfGlen/view?usp=shari... )
